text.name: longdescription
text.text: The VIC-20(DE), VIC-1001(JP) by Commodore Business Machines is the first computer of any description to sell 1 mil. units. CPU MOS Tech 6502 @1.108404MHz (PAL) @1.02MHz (NTSC) MEM 20KB ROM + 5KB RAM (expand. to 32KB), 3.5KB for BASIC (expand to 27.5KB). Release date '80.
